content: The Apollo 13 astronauts had to abort their mission due to an explosion in which part of their spacecraft?

The Apollo 13 astronauts had to abort their mission due to an explosion in the service module of their spacecraft. The explosion occurred when oxygen tank No. 2 burst, causing damage to the module and depleting the spacecraft's oxygen, electricity, and water supplies. This forced the crew to cancel their planned lunar landing and loop around the Moon in the lunar module before returning to Earth.
